title: Corporate Governance Practices of Elevance Health Inc

content.text: Elevance Health Inc has a board of directors composed of nine members. The board includes independent directors as well as executives from the company. This composition ensures a balance of perspectives and expertise in guiding the company's strategic direction and decision-making processes.

Elevance Health Inc has a transparent and comprehensive executive compensation program. It aligns executive pay with the company's performance and shareholder value creation. The compensation committee of the board evaluates and approves executive compensation, considering factors such as individual performance, industry benchmarks, and company financials.

Elevance Health Inc has several board committees to oversee specific aspects of corporate governance. These committees include an audit committee, compensation committee, and nominating and governance committee. Each committee has a clear charter outlining its responsibilities, which helps ensure effective oversight and accountability.

Elevance Health Inc values shareholder engagement and regularly communicates with its shareholders. The company holds annual general meetings to provide updates on its performance and allow shareholders to ask questions and express their views. The company also encourages shareholders to participate in the voting process for important matters.

Elevance Health Inc has a strong commitment to ethics and compliance. The company has established a code of conduct and ethics that applies to all directors, officers, and employees. The code promotes integrity, transparency, and legal compliance. The company also provides training and resources to ensure employees understand and adhere to these principles.

Elevance Health Inc has implemented a robust risk management framework. The board regularly assesses and monitors risks to the company's operations, financials, and reputation. The company has established clear policies and procedures to mitigate risks and ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

Elevance Health Inc prioritizes transparency and disclosure in its corporate governance practices. The company provides regular updates to shareholders and the public through financial reports, press releases, and regulatory filings. This ensures stakeholders have access to accurate and timely information to make informed decisions.

Elevance Health Inc demonstrates strong corporate governance practices through its balanced board composition, transparent executive compensation program, effective board committees, shareholder engagement initiatives, commitment to ethics and compliance, robust risk management framework, and emphasis on transparency and disclosure. These practices contribute to the company's overall governance effectiveness and stakeholder trust.
